localised_description: A greater daemon was slain in our most recent hunt, and our achievement has not gone unnoticed. The Four are impressed and wish to reward their rising champion, while in the distance a mighty howl can be heard echoing over the mountains. Whose favor shall we receive?
We have earned the attention of the Four, but we may only receive a boon from one. Whose gift shall we receive?
Following the wolf cry, we find ourselves in a frigid mountain valley. Before us stands an enormous white wolf, its eyes gleaming with intelligence. Hail to the Wolf God.
